column1: #Text=Kai says : " The place where I saw them taking the airbenders is around here . "
#Text=Mako says : " That 's got to be where they took Korra . "
#Text=I 'm not coming out without our children and the rest of your people .
#Text=" Amon says : " I told you , Korra .
#Text=The world does n't need you anymore .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " The time of the Avatar is over , Korra .
#Text=" Vaatu says : " You 're too weak to resist , and I 'm stronger than ever .
#Text=" Amon , Unalaq , and Vaatu says : " Let go .
